messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
Can’t you see I’m fishing?
Don’t talk! You’ll spook the fish!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
How do you like that?
Both my catch and the win got away!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
Fishing and battling are delicate
things--as am I. Is that wrong?
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
You can see I’m fishing, can’t you?
Then don’t talk to me! Geez!
